mapper.insert: INSERT INTO dashboards (name, active, id_user, tx_user_id, tx_host, tx_date) VALUE (#{name}, #{active}, #{idUser}, #{txUserId}, #{txHost}, #{txDate});
mapper.select: SELECT d.id_dashboard AS idDashboard, d.name AS name, d.active AS active, p.id_user AS idUser FROM dashboards d, persons p WHERE d.id_user = p.id_user AND p.id_user = #{idUser}
